product.longDescription:
A new look to carry on, feature rich with a sustainable twist, the NuRoad Spinner is sure to go the distance. Featuring Samsonite’s Recyclex® lining made from 100% recycled bottles, 2 interior packing compartments, and bonus RIFD & 3-1-1 friendly bags make this perfect for the “carry on only” crowd.
  • Nylon & Polyester primary fabrics which include a water-repellent coating, leather-like PU trim, & Recyclex® Lining
  • Carry-On size and weight allowances vary by airlines. Visit our Carry-On Guide for more details. If the bag is overstuffed, it may not be accepted by the airlines.
  • 4 exterior pockets offer a place to put everything
  • Cable TSA Lock: TSA-approved cable lock threads through zipper pulls to secure access to the main compartment
  • Dual Spinner Wheels: provide easy & smooth handling over long-haul travel across various surfaces
  • RightHeight™ Trolley Handle: multi-stop adjustments allow you to extend the handle to a custom height that's perfect for you
  • 2 padded handles for easy, grab & go carry
  • Retractable ID holder is discreetly located in the back of the case under the trolley handle
  • Back kickplate & corner guards provide a little extra protection for those rigorous journey's
  • Removable 3-1-1 friendly pouch is made of wipe-clean material
  • Front pocket interiors include 2 mesh slip pockets and a Key Fob to organize all the essentials
  • Packing compartment features 4 zippered storage pockets; 1 large to store items needed quickly without unpacking everything, 1 mesh pocket, and 2 lining pockets to store smaller accessories
  • Elastic cross straps keep belongings in place during travel
  • Removable pouch, ideal to store tech accessories; features an RFID lined pocket & wireless charging capabilities
product.shortDescription: A new look to carry on, feature rich with a sustainable twist, the NuRoad Spinner is sure to go the distance. Featuring Samsonite’s Recyclex® lining made from 100% recycled bottles, 2 interior packing compartments, and bonus RIFD & 3-1-1 friendly bags make this perfect for the “carry on only” crowd.

tooltip: The total dimensions of the case including handles and wheels
The dimensions of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions
Recyclex® polyester fabric, which is created using 100% recycled rPET bottles, is crafted to be durable, flexible, and prevents post-consumer waste from ending up in a landfill.
Includes an RFID pocket that protects against Identity Theft
To learn more about TSA locks and how to set the lock please visit our lock instructions page
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.pageTitle: NuRoad Carry-On Spinner | Women's Carry-On Spinner | Samsonite
product.pageDescription: A new look to carry on, feature rich with a sustainable twist, the NuRoad Carry-On Spinner is sure to go the distance with its interior packing compartments.
